alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:06PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Thunderstorm winds and potentially additional thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 645 PM MST... At 605 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from near Castle Hot Springs to near Carefree to near Scottsdale Airport. Movement was west at 15 mph. Additional storm redevelopment possible. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Paradise Valley, Wickenburg, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, Lake Pleasant, North Mountain Park, Metro Center Mall, Scottsdale Airport, Camelback Mountain, Desert Ridge Marketplace and Anthem. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 near mile marker 145. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 205 and 230. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 2 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa
